meanings.definition: Clothing worn for sleeping, typically consisting of pajamas or a nightgown.
meanings.sent1: She put on her comfortable nightwear before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy new nightwear for the colder weather.
meanings.sent3: His nightwear was so cozy, he almost fell asleep during dinner!
meanings.sent4: The nightwear hugged her like a warm blanket, lulling her into a peaceful slumber.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the nightwear felt like a gentle hug against her skin.

meanings.definition: The act of wearing clothing specifically designed for sleeping.
meanings.sent1: Her nightly routine included putting on her nightwear before getting into bed.
meanings.sent2: Proper nightwear can help improve the quality of your sleep.
meanings.sent3: He made a fashion statement by wearing his nightwear to the grocery store!
meanings.sent4: The nightwear transformed her into a sleep-ready superhero, ready to conquer the land of dreams.
meanings.sent5: The act of slipping into nightwear signaled the end of the day and the beginning of rest.
